messages.subject: Joanna
messages.msgSnippet: I don t know you and I m balling! You sound like such a wonderful mother and woman, and I am so sorry for your family s loss. I read Sandra s post yesterday,
messages.messageBody:
I don't know you and I'm balling! You sound like such a wonderful mother and woman, and I am so sorry for your family's loss.

I read Sandra's post yesterday, and my heart went out to you. Later as my kids and I were playing outside, my Sam (3.5) went into our fish pond trying to break the ice on it. He only went in up to his waist, but I thought of you and what you must have gone through as my girls and I ran him inside, got him warm and put him by the woodstove. My whole soul mourns for you, Joanna!

You and your family sound so strong and courageous and loving. You are an inspiration as you have found strategies to continue to incorporate your Sam into your lives.

Sincerely,

danielle

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
I am so sorry to hear of your loss, my heart goes out to you. I hope you are
able to find peace.
Laura Buoni
